location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 51: Commodore George Robinson, Commander of the Persian Gulf Squadron, Writing from the HC Sloop Clive, off Sharjah, to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter Commodore George Robinson, Commander of the Persian Gulf Squadron, encloses a copy of a letter received from Lieutenant James Tronson, Commander of the HC brigantine Tigris, which contains intelligence received from the Agent at Sharjah, Hadjee Yacoob [Hajji Yaqoob]. The enclosure, letter no. 1, dated 4 May 1853, reports on the recent movements of Sultan bin Suggur [Sulṭān bin Saqr Āl Qāsimī].
